solution_line_template: The sum of pages of her history and geography textbook is {history_pages} + {geography_pages} = <<{history_pages}+{geography_pages}={history_geography_sum}>>{history_geography_sum} pages
Her science textbook has {history_pages} x {science_multiplier} = <<{history_pages}*{science_multiplier}={science_pages}>>{science_pages} pages
In total, there would be {history_pages} + {geography_pages} + {math_pages} + {science_pages} = <<{history_pages}+{geography_pages}+{math_pages}+{science_pages}={total_pages}>>{total_pages} pages
